snippet: In Hari Kunzru’s novel, close encounters with U.F.O.’s are mixed with the story of a strained marriage and a missing child.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews novel Gods Without Men by Hari Kunzru.
lead_paragraph: In Hari Kunzru’s novel, close encounters with U.F.O.’s are mixed with the story of a strained marriage and a missing child.

headline.seo: ‘Gods Without Men,’ a Novel by Hari Kunzru
headline.main: Aliens of All Varieties, Wandering in the Desert
